src.routes package

Submodules

src.routes.ad_route module

async src.routes.ad_route.create_ad(ad: AdModel = Body(Ellipsis))

Function to handle the POST request to add a new ad to the ad collection

Parameters

ad – AdModel object containing the required tuple details

Returns

JSON object with the inserted tuple along with an HTTP response

async src.routes.ad_route.delete_ad(id: str)

Function to handle the DELETE request, to delete a particular entry

Parameters

id (str) – id of the entry to be deleted

Returns

HTTP error response if the id not found

async src.routes.ad_route.get_ad(id: str)

Function to handle the GET request to get a particular ad from the collection.

Parameters

id (str) – id of the ad to be retrieved.

Returns

JSON object with the requested ad and HTTP response or an HTTP error

async src.routes.ad_route.list_ads()

Function to handle the GET request to list all the ads in the collection.

Returns

JSON objects with all the ads and an HTTP response

async src.routes.ad_route.update_ad(id: str, ad: UpdateAdModel = Body(Ellipsis))

Function to handle the PATCH request to update a particular entry

Parameters

  • id (str) – id of the entry to be updated

  • ad – UpdateAdModel object with the new details

Returns

JSON object with the updated details and HTTP response or an HTTP error
